text: (nabiye,) parayuka: enre svantam dehattin tanne upakaramea, upadravamea varuttal enre adhinattil pettatalla. allahu uddesiccatealike. enikk adrsyakaryamariyamayirunnuvenkil nan dharalam gunam netiyetukkumayirunnu. tinma enne badhikkukayumillayirunnu. nanearu takkitukaranum visvasikkunna janannalkk santeasamariyikkunnavanum matramanâ€Œ
